description.text: Generates the cross power spectrum of one vector with another.

table.name: Vector One
table.descr: The first vector to be correlated.

table.name: Vector Two
table.descr: The second vector to be correlated.

float.name: FFT Length = 2^
float.descr: Length of FFTs used in cross spectra.

float.name: Sample Rate
float.descr: Sample rate, used for X axis
